wikipedia_page.main: James Horton (born 1909) was an English professional footballer who played as a full back.

response: * James Horton (Highlander), fictional character from Highlander: The Series
*James Horton (Medal of Honor, 1864) (1840 - 1894) Union Navy sailor who received the Medal of Honor for bravery
